For FICO scores Elite MI (BPMI) â‰¥ 760. No loan amount floor or LTV cap. Available in all states except AK, HI and OH. This is a Borrower Paid M.I. plan which allows the borrower to finance the entire premium into their loan amount to avoid Monthly M.I. in their Single Premium Financed housing payment. Not available for the Broker channel. *Correspondent limited to MAX 2.5% MIP factor due to QM. This is a Borrower Paid M.I. plan which allows the borrower to pay the entire premium at close & avoid Monthly M.I. in their housing payment. Single Premium Non-Financed Broker available only for purchase, must pass QM. *Correspondent limited to MAX 2.5% MIP factor due to QM. This is a hybrid of both BPMI and Pay Advantage. 0.50% of the Split 50 adjustment is rolled into the rate and the borrower's monthly MI rate is lowered. This is a hybrid of both BPMI and Pay Advantage. 1.0% of the adjustment Split 100 is rolled into the rate and the borrower's monthly MI rate is lowered.
